title: Guess the Square
pageDescription: Guess the highlighted square as quickly as possible within 1 minute—perfect for sharpening lightning-fast board reading.
metaDescription: Guess the highlighted square as quickly as possible within 1 minute—perfect for sharpening lightning-fast board reading.
cardDescription: Spot the highlighted square fast to sharpen board vision.

title: Blind Tactics
pageDescription: Blind Tactics is inspired by listudy.org—visualize the board entirely in your head and calculate the single winning continuation.
metaDescription: Blind Tactics is inspired by listudy.org—visualize the board entirely in your head and calculate the single winning continuation.
cardDescription: Solve tactics in your head—no board, pure focus.

title: Mix Tactics
pageDescription: Mix Tactics consists of standard chess puzzle tactics served in random orders and unpredictable difficulty spikes.
metaDescription: Mix Tactics consists of standard chess puzzle tactics served in random orders and unpredictable difficulty spikes.
cardDescription: Random puzzles with unpredictable twists and levels.

title: Zero Sum Game
pageDescription: Zero Sum Game is a fun mix of math and chess—make clever placements until every attacked square sums to zero.
metaDescription: Zero Sum Game is a fun mix of math and chess—make clever placements until every attacked square sums to zero.
cardDescription: Balance math and chess—place pieces to hit zero.
